tool.name: Make heatmap
tool.command:
matrix2png -data $input #if str( $range ) != '' -range $range #end if
-con $con -size $size -numcolors $numcolors -minsize $minsize -mincolor $mincolor -maxcolor $maxcolor -bkgcolor $bkgcolor -missingcolor $missingcolor
#if str( $map ) != '' -map $map #end if
#if str( $discrete_color_maps.discrete ) != 'false' -discrete -dmap $dmap #end if
#if str( $numr ) != '' -numr $numr #end if
#if str( $numc ) != '' -numc $numc #end if
-startrow $startrow -startcol $startcol
#if str( $trim ) != '0' -trim $trim #end if
#if str( $title ) != '' -title '$title' #end if
$z $b $d $s $r $c $f $e $l $u
> $output

param.name: input
param.label: Input data

param.name: title
param.label: Add a title

param.name: size
param.label: Pixel dimensions per value as x:y

param.name: minsize
param.label: Minimum image size as x:y pixels

param.name: range
param.label: Values assigned to mincolor and maxcolor as min:max (default is data range)

param.name: con
param.label: Contrast (only applies when not using -range option)

param.name: numcolors
param.label: Number of colors

param.name: mincolor
param.label: Color used at lowest value (name or r:g:b triplet)

param.name: maxcolor
param.label: Color used at highest value (name or r:g:b triplet)

param.name: bkgcolor
param.label: Color used as background (name or r:g:b triplet)

param.name: missingcolor
param.label: Color used for missing values (name or r:g:b triplet)

param.name: map
param.label: Color choices from preset maps: overrides min/max colors and -b (default = 0 (none))

param.name: discrete
param.label: Use discretized mapping of values to colors

param.name: dmap
param.label: Discrete color mapping file to use for discrete mapping (default = preset)

param.name: numr
param.label: Number of rows to process (default = all)

param.name: numc
param.label: Number of columns to process (default = all)

param.name: startrow
param.label: Index of the first row to be processed

param.name: startcol
param.label: Index of the first column to be processed

param.name: trim
param.label: Trim this percent of data extremes when determining data range (only without the -range option)

param.name: z
param.label: Row-normalize the data to mean 0 and variance 1

param.name: b
param.label: Middle of color range is black

param.name: d
param.label: Add cell dividers

param.name: s
param.label: Add scale bar

param.name: r
param.label: Add row names

param.name: c
param.label: Add column names

param.name: f
param.label: Data file has a format line

param.name: e
param.label: Draw ellipses instead of rectangles

param.name: l
param.label: Log transform the data (base 2)

param.name: u
param.label: Put the column labels under the picture instead of above (ignored unless column names)

param.name: g
param.label: Put the row labels to the left instead of the right (ignored unless row names)

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
This tool requires tabular data with column AND row headers. For more information about the required format and usage instructions, see http://bioinformatics.ubc.ca/matrix2png/dataformat.html
